Package io.wcm.caconfig.editor

Class EditorProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.wcm.caconfig.editor.EditorProperties
  • @ProviderType
public final class EditorProperties
extends java.lang.Object
    Properties that can be used for configuration property definitions to customize the edit widget within the editor.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_CATEGORY
      Property name for defining a category for configurations.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS
      Defines the list of dropdown options as JSON array with the list options.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS_PROVIDER
      Defines the OSGi service property of a DropdownOptionProvider implementation that should be used to dynamically fetch a list of dropdown options, instead of providing a fixed set of dropdown options via PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH
      With this additional property the root path for the path browser widget can be set: The root path is passed as string value of the property.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_CONTEXT
      With this additional property the root path for the path browser widget can be set: If set to true, the current configuration context path is used as root path.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_PROVIDER
      Defines the OSGi service property of a PathBrowserRootPathProvider implementation that should be used to dynamically define the root path, instead of providing a fixed one via PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_REQUIRED
      Define this property as required/mandatory.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH
      With this additional property the root path for the tag browser widget can be set: The root path is passed as string value of the property.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_PROVIDER
      Defines the OSGi service property of a PathBrowserRootPathProvider implementation that should be used to dynamically define the root path, instead of providing a fixed one via PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_TEXTAREA_ROWS
      Property name for defining the property "rows" of Textarea.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_VALIDATION
      Property name for defining a custom validation for a string or numeric parameter.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_VALIDATION_MESSAGE
      Property name for defining a custom validation message.
      static java.lang.String PROPERTY_WIDGET_TYPE
      Property name for defining the widget type.
      static java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_DROPDOWN
      Widget type to add a dropdown list selection widget to a string or number parameter.
      static java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_PATHBROWSER
      Widget type to add a pathbrowser selection widget to a string parameter.
      static java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_TAGBROWSER
      Widget type to add a tagbrowser selection widget to a string parameter.
      static java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_TEXTAREA
      Widget type that allows to enter multiple lines of text for a string parameter.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • PROPERTY_CATEGORY

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_CATEGORY
        Property name for defining a category for configurations. The editor allows to filter by category. This property has to be applied to a configuration definition, not to a property definition.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_WIDGET_TYPE

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_WIDGET_TYPE
        Property name for defining the widget type. Values should be one of the WIDGET_TYPE_* properties.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WIDGET_TYPE_PATHBROWSER

        public static final java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_PATHBROWSER
        Widget type to add a pathbrowser selection widget to a string parameter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH
        With this additional property the root path for the path browser widget can be set: The root path is passed as string value of the property.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_CONTEXT

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_CONTEXT
        With this additional property the root path for the path browser widget can be set: If set to true, the current configuration context path is used as root path.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_PROVIDER

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_PROVIDER
        Defines the OSGi service property of a PathBrowserRootPathProvider implementation that should be used to dynamically define the root path, instead of providing a fixed one via PROPERTY_PATHBROWSER_ROOT_PATH.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WIDGET_TYPE_DROPDOWN

        public static final java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_DROPDOWN
        Widget type to add a dropdown list selection widget to a string or number parameter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS
        Defines the list of dropdown options as JSON array with the list options. Each list option item is a JSON object with two properties value and description.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS_PROVIDER

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS_PROVIDER
        Defines the OSGi service property of a DropdownOptionProvider implementation that should be used to dynamically fetch a list of dropdown options, instead of providing a fixed set of dropdown options via PROPERTY_DROPDOWN_OPTIONS.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WIDGET_TYPE_TEXTAREA

        public static final java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_TEXTAREA
        Widget type that allows to enter multiple lines of text for a string parameter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • WIDGET_TYPE_TAGBROWSER

        public static final java.lang.String WIDGET_TYPE_TAGBROWSER
        Widget type to add a tagbrowser selection widget to a string parameter.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH
        With this additional property the root path for the tag browser widget can be set: The root path is passed as string value of the property.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_PROVIDER

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH_PROVIDER
        Defines the OSGi service property of a PathBrowserRootPathProvider implementation that should be used to dynamically define the root path, instead of providing a fixed one via PROPERTY_TAGBROWSER_ROOT_PATH.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_REQUIRED

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_REQUIRED
        Define this property as required/mandatory. Configuration cannot be saved if no value is given.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_VALIDATION

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_VALIDATION
        Property name for defining a custom validation for a string or numeric parameter. The value is either a name of a Granite UI Foundation Validator, or a registered custom validation method. See documentation for details.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_VALIDATION_MESSAGE

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_VALIDATION_MESSAGE
        Property name for defining a custom validation message. Set to a message (or i18n key) to be displayed if any of the configured validations fails.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PROPERTY_TEXTAREA_ROWS

        public static final java.lang.String PROPERTY_TEXTAREA_ROWS
        Property name for defining the property "rows" of Textarea.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
